content: stars and diamonds hat by emily dormier materials 2 different colored skeins of worsted weight yarn one of each color size us 8/5 0mm 16in/40cm circular needle size us 8/5 0mm double pointed needles yarn needle gauge 20 stitches and 26 row = 4 inches in stockinette abbreviations k-knit p-purl k2t-knit two together cast on 88 stitches on circular needle and join in the round round 1-8 work in color a *k2 p2* repeat until end of round round 9-12 knit in color a round 13-31 work pattern round 32-33 knit in color a transfer onto double pointed needles round 34 worked in color a *k6 k2t* repeat until end of round round 35 knit with color a round 36 worked in color a *k5 k2t* repeat until end of round round 37 knit with color a round 38 worked in color a *k4 k2t* repeat until end of round round 39 knit with color a round 40 worked in color a *k3 k2t* repeat until end of round round 41 knit with color a round 42 worked in color a *k2 k2t* repeat until end of round round 43 knit with color a round 44 worked in color a *k1 k2t* repeat until end of round round 45 knit with color a round 46 worked in color a *k2t* repeat until end of round round 47 worked in color a *k2t k1* until 2 left k2t cut the yarn with several inches to work with with a yarn needle pull the yarn through all the remaining loops weave in ends a b r o r o 0 5 0 5 lo c lo c 3 2 2 1
